long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your Chrome experience with the Chelsea FC wallpapers new tab extension! 

Designed for fans, it showcases vibrant wallpapers of your favorite football club while keeping your new tab organized. The extension includes a user-friendly search bar for seamless web navigation and convenient shortcuts to your top sites. Perfect for avid Chelsea supporters or anyone wanting a stylish browsing interface, this extension is a must-have. Download now and let your passion for Chelsea shine every time you open a new tab!
